sentences.sentence: His left hand moved feebly at his side.
sentences.translation: 他的左手在身边无力地动了一下。

sentences.sentence: I said "Sorry," very feebly, feeling rather embarrassed.
sentences.translation: 我很微弱地说了句“对不起”，感到特别尴尬。

sentences.sentence: 'But I've only just got here,' he bleated feebly.
sentences.translation: “可我刚刚才到这里呢。”他小声抱怨说。
